58446.「ありがとうございます <cs_pchero>さま。\n おかげで 無事に たど:
Thank you <cs_pchero>. Thanks to you, I got
there safely.

58447.「この地が 巨竜の霊丘と呼ばれているのは\n 見てのとおり 巨大な竜の骨が\n:
This place is called Dragon Hill because, as
you can see, the bones of a gigantic dragon
rest quietly here.

58448.「かつて 天空を治めたという白銀の竜が\n このアストルティアに墜ち 屍となった:
The legend tells of a silver dragon that once
ruled the skies, but crashed in Astoltia and
became a corpse.

58449.「この地を 儀式の舞台と選んだのは\n その竜の聖なるチカラを 借りるため。\n:
The reason we chose this place as the setting for our ritual is to borrow the sacred power of the dragon. This power is necessary for the
success of the ritual.

58450.「それでは ロディアさまの魂を呼び寄せる\n 目覚めの儀式を とりおこないましょ:
Let us now perform the awakening ritual that
will call forth the spirit of Rhodia.

58451.「何が起こるか わかりません。\n <cs_pchero>さまは 儀式の間\n:
We don't know what will happen. The
<cs_pchero> ask that you protect us during
the Ritual Hall.

58452.世告げの姫たちは 太古の祭壇の上で\n手を取り合い 儀式を始めた……。:
The Oracle Princesses joined hands on the
Ancient Altar and began their ritual...

58453.「我ら 世告げの姫の主導者たる\n 導きのロディアよ。\n 目覚めの時は すでに:
O Rhodia, our guiding light, leader of the
Oracle Princess. The time of the awakening has
already come...

58454.「願わくば その魂よ。\n はるかな大地で待つ身に 降臨せよ……。:
O, I pray, O soul. Descend to the body that
waits in the far-off land...

58455.「導きのロディアよ 目覚めたまえ。\n 世告げの時は すでに来たれり……。:
Awake, Rhodia, our guide. The time of the
prophecy has already come...

58456.世告げの姫たちの身体に\n白い光が集まっていく……。:
White light gathers on the bodies of the
Oracle Princesses...

58457.しかし 突然 その光が はじけ飛んだ！: But suddenly, that light burst into flames!

58459.「<cs_pchero>さま。儀式は失敗しました。\n ロディアさまの魂は今 呼:
<cs_pchero>. The ritual has failed. It seems
that Rhodia's soul is now in a state that
cannot be summoned.

58460.「こうなれば シュゼたちが作った結界の中まで\n 直接 迎えにいくしかありません:
If this happens, we have no choice but to go directly to the wards created by Shuzet and the others to pick them up. Please accompany
as well.

58462.「世告げの姫を マッサツせよ。\n すべて マッサツせよ……。:
Massacre the Oracle Princess. Massacre them
all...

58463.「……結界の中に 魔物が！？\n ロディアさまの魂は……？:
There's a monster in the wards! Rhodia's
soul...?

58465.「……なんとしても 魔物を倒し\n ロディアさまの魂を 救わなくてはなりません！:
...we must do whatever it takes to defeat the
monster and save Rhodia's soul! Let's go
<cs_pchero>!

58469.「邪悪なる者の魔の手から 救いだしてくださり\n 感謝いたします <cs_pch:
Thank you for rescuing us from the clutches of
the evil one <cs_pchero>.

58471.「……くわしくは わかりませんが\n 私たち 世告げの姫の行動を邪魔するために\:
I don't know the details, but I think it is
safe to assume that she was sent to interfere
with the actions of us, the Oracle Princesses.

58472.「シュゼとテルナも あの魔物に襲われ\n 命を落としたようです……。\n ですが:
It seems that Shuzet and Terna were attacked
by that monster and lost their lives... but we
don't have time to grieve.

58473.「私たちには 滅びの時を迎えるまでに\n やらなければならないことが\n まだ:
We still have a lot of work to do before we
meet our demise.

58474.「……<cs_pchero>さま。これからも\n あなたのチカラが 必要となるで:
...<cs_pchero>. We will need your help in
the future. Please come to Zama Beacon...

58476.「<cs_pchero>さま。\n ロディアさまを 救っていただき\n 本当に:
<cs_pchero>. Thank you so much for saving
Rhodia.

58477.「こちらは 私たちからの お礼です。\n どうか お受け取りください。:
This is our way of saying thank you. Please
accept it.

58478.「それぞれの役目を果たすため 私たちは\n 自分たちの あるべき場所に戻ります。:
We will return to where we belong, to do our
part. So...
